verbs.description: Finally , the possibility of [V: engaging] [ARG1: a special prosecutor] [ARG2: to investigate Hillary Clinton , James Comey , Robert Mueller , Susan Rice , James Clapper , Rod Rosenstein , Loretta Lynch , John Podesta and many others for all the multitude of allegations in their attempts to destroy President Trump] . It might happen . I think it 's long past time for a special prosecutor to clear the air , once and for all . Would n't it be amazing if all were indicted , tried and found guilty as charged ? It would be the biggest scandal in our country 's political history . How sad for America , to have such a terrible legacy ! I wonder if that occurred , would the Democrats , the news media and swampers finally end their 24/7 , vicious , never - ending attack on everything our president thinks , says or does ? Robert W. Kalman Bethlehem
